Text: Agh! Damn it...!
What?!
Nghh!
Aghhh!
With borrowed power, you'll never walk...
...the path of the almighty!
What the—?!

This is the first time in this battle that Shadow
intensifies his magic. Until now, he's barely used
it.

It is so exceptionally precise that it's impossible
to perceive.

This surge of magic shows itself in the form of
blue-violet rays of light. There are hundreds of
ultrathin strands.

These create a dazzling pattern as they wrap
themselves around Shadow like veins.
Playtime is over.
Oh—!
What is this...?

Is this magic?! How can one person...possess so
much?!
Once...
...there was a man who challenged nuclear power.
He trained his body and mind to hone his techniques.
But it remained far beyond his reach.
And then...
//ムービー再生
All sound is lost.

The light penetrates everything, consuming the walls
and the earth, blasting upward into the night sky.

As patterns of light are etched into the night sky,
the entire capital assumes a blue-violet hue.

From impossibly far away, the delayed blast ripples
across the city, sweeping away the rain clouds,
shaking the ground and the private residences before
passing.

All that's left is a full moon and the beautiful
night sky full of stars.

Zenon has been vaporized. He doesn't even leave
behind a single speck of dust.

And then...Shadow flings open his coat and slips into
the night.

The large hole had blast though the wall all the way
above ground.

Alexia looks down and sees a fractured sword at her
feet.
She picks it up and readies her stance.
Then, she swings.
Alexia!　Alexia!
What?!

The person gasps for air and shouts from far away. 
It's a voice she instantly recognizes.
Alexia!
Iris!
Alexia...!
Oh—!

Alexia is embraced before she can tell her sister
she's unharmed.

Iris is soaking from head to toe, and her body feels
chilly and warm at the same time.
I'm so glad you're safe... I really am!
*gasp*
I'm sorry. I must be cold.
Alexia shakes her head against her sister's chest.
Thank you...Iris.
